column4: anyone know how i can remove libre office? sudo apt-get --purge remove libreoffice doesnt work
lame... searching "libreoffice" in synaptic package manager brings up everything installed, but using the terminal I get "E: Couldn't find package libreoffice"
synaptic won't give you "Libreoffce" but things like "Libreoffice-common". there is a difference there
